data.title: French Order of Battle : Ordre de Bataille : Leipzig 1813 : Leipsic : Lipsk
meta_keywords: French order of battle of Leipzig

[*] - After the disastrous Russian campaign in 1812

the Polish cuirassiers wore no front and back plates.

[**] - The Krakus was an unique unit, Napoleon called

them "Pygmy Cavalry." There were more successful

against the Cossacks than any other napoleonic troop.

[***] - Dabrowski with one brigade was detached from

the Polish corps and moved north of Leipzig, under Ney.
